attributes.action: Dan Hannan to replace David Cameron in October when he resigns.
attributes.background: Dan Hannan is a conservative MEP, and an advocate of the Leave Campaign. As David Cameron will resign in October a rational and forward thinking leader must be selected. Dan Hannan speaks 3 languages and has very strong international links making him very selectable for this role.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. 

In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament. 

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
